summary: Ex-Green Beret hapkido expert saves wild horses from being slaughtered for dog food and helps protect a desert "freedom school" for runaway.
cast: Tom Laughlin|Delores Taylor|Clark Howat|Victor Izay|Julie Webb|Debbie Schock|Teresa Kelly|Lynn Baker|Stan Rice|David Roya|John McClure|Susan Foster|Susan Sosa|Katy Moffatt|Gwen Smith|Richard Stahl|Alan Myerson|Ed Greenberg|Howard Hesseman|Beans Morocco|Herb Kohl|Phillip Crowder|Robert Wilson|David Conley|Meg Partridge|Jenny Bellah|James French|Becky Voight|Laurie Mayeno|Mark Baum|Alva Thompson|Johnny Otis|Melissa Stocking|Nora Bendich|Sira Aarons|Lenny Pickett|Phillip Salvarry|Bert Freed|Kenneth Tobey|Paul Bruce|Cisse Cameron|Jessica Myerson
title: Billy, el defensor
